titleHead: Upload evidence - Appeal a benefit decision - GOV.UK
title: Upload evidence
description: You can upload letters, documents or photos. For example you could take a photo of a letter from your doctor and upload it. Make sure the letter or document is on a flat surface and the photo is taken from above.

error.maxFileSizeExceeded: The file is too big. The maximum size is 10 mb
error.wrongFileType: The document is not in an allowed format
